entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is mentioned as suggesting that someone could have flown into Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as reading the book 'Hogwarts, A History' and explaining the enchantments on the castle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in conversation with Hermione and Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned in conversation with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a castle protected by enchantments.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as guarding the entrances to the grounds of Hogwarts.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as knowing all the secret passages in Hogwarts.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as shouting to turn out the lights and have everyone go to sleep.

relationships.description: Harry has visited Hogwarts, but it's implied that he didn't fly in.
Hermione has read about Hogwarts and is familiar with its enchantments.
Dementors are guarding the entrances to the grounds of Hogwarts.
Filch knows all the secret passages in Hogwarts.
